subproject.description:
This project contributes to the reduction of
greenhouse gas emissions through the transformation
of the Chinese air conditioning market towards more
energy-efficient room air conditioners used in
residential and commercial buildings. However, some
barriers should be recognized when achieving such
objectives:
 Lack of familiarity with EE technology and
market insecurity inhibits EE product
development and commercialization;
 Retailers and consumers lack awareness of EE
benefits;
 EE standards do not encourage EE products;
 Manufactures unsure of cost effectiveness and
market for EE products.
subproject.title: Promoting EE RAC

title: 4040 CC FSP: Promoting EE Room Air Conditioners (PEERAC)
